gov.nasa.arc.mct.collection.access
Class ComponentRegistryAccess

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.arc.mct.collection.access.ComponentRegistryAccess

public class ComponentRegistryAccess
extends java.lang.Object

The ComponentRegistryAccess class is used to inject an instance of the ComponentRegistry using declarative services. This OSGi component does not expose an interface (see OSGI-INF/component.xml) and thus will be usable from other bundles ( the class is not exported from this bundle). This class is thread safe as this may be access from multiple threads and the registry instance must be visible across all threads.

Method Detail

getComponentRegistry

public static ComponentRegistry getComponentRegistry()
Returns the component registry instance. This will not return null as the cardinality of the component specified through the OSGi components services is 1.

Returns:
a component registry service instance

setRegistry

public void setRegistry(ComponentRegistry componentRegistry)
set the active instance of the ComponentRegistry. This method is invoked by OSGi (see the OSGI-INF/component.xml file for additional details).

Parameters:
componentRegistry - available in MCT

releaseRegistry

public void releaseRegistry(ComponentRegistry componentRegistry)
release the active instance of the ComponentRegistry. This method is invoked by OSGi (see the OSGI-INF/component.xml file for additional details).

Parameters:
componentRegistry - to be released
